Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Armitage
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing in both directions due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near the area of Armitage. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing in both directions due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near the area of Armitage. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
